[\[120b.5\]]bdag gi som nyi the tshom bsal/_/byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste/_/sdug bsngal mthar bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/_/gang zag bdag gis klu yi bdag po yi/_/bsam pa thugs chud byang chub lung bstan pa/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ru/_/spyad pa spyod 
[\[120b.6\]]nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/mi mchog mtshan ni thams cad sgrol ba ste/_/srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar bar byed/_/de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur ba ste/_/skye bo mang po mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/klu de ston pa'i gsung gis dga' gyur nas/_/'jig rten phan mdzad 
[\[120b.7\]]rnam 'dren mngon bstod pa/_/khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don ni rgya cher mdzad/_/sdug bsngal mthar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa/_de nas klu'i rgyal po tshib pa'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]pa/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten don slad du/_/'jig rten don mdzad rnam 'dren la zhu ba/_/spyad pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/_/ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur/_/tshib pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas/_/nyon mongs thams cad 
[\[121a.2\]]bsal bas lung bstan pa/_/dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'ong zhing /_/nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya/_/de ni 'gro kun tshe dang sangs rgyas la/_/mchog tu dang ba dag gis sems kyang shes/_/de yis las kyi lam de byas pas na/_/'gro ba'i rtag pa rgyal ba dag tu 
[\[121a.3\]]'gyur/_/de yis rgyal ba'i bshad pa thos nas su/_/'gro ba thams cad la ni dad par byas/_/de tshe de yis dge ba byas pas na/_/'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas su ni 'gyur ba ste/_/srog 
[\[121a.4\]]chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing /_/spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed mngon bstod pa/_/'gro ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam yas bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[121a.5\]]lo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dpag tu med/_/skyon dang bral zhing yon tan mchog brnyes pa/_/stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gnon khyod la ni/_/byang chub zhi spyod mkhas 
[\[121a.6\]]pa rab gnas zhu/_/des pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang /_/rgyal ba'i mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/_/bdud kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar spang /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji ltar spyad/_/rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang /_/ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul 
[\[121a.7\]]spyad pa dang /_/ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag_/lam gnyis shin tu mkhyen pas rab tu bstan/_/ston pa la ni klu bdag des zhus nas/_/de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa/_/mi mkhas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod/_/de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]yul spyod/_/gang dag sems can med cing yid mi gnas/_/de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod/_/nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas su/_/byang chub bla med zhi ba des thob bo/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/bdud kyi spyod yul myur bar rnam 
[\[121b.2\]]spangs te/_/sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs ltar spyod yul dag_/bsten pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po gau ta mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_kha lo sgyur mchog khyod la zhu bgyi ba/_/'dren pa khyod sras ji ltar 
[\[121b.3\]]spyad bgyis nas/_/klu yi skye gnas dag ni gcod bgyid cing /_/sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu bskyed par bgyid/_/bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang /_/de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa/_/sems can med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing /_/byang chub sems la 
[\[121b.4\]]nams kyang de mi gnas/_/de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa yin/_/mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnam spangs shing /_/mdzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dag_/'di ni sangs rgyas chos mngon myu gu bskyed/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/mi dmigs pa la 
[\[121b.5\]]brten par rab gnas shing /_/bdud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nas su/_/sangs rgyas tshul la klu ni rab tu gnas/_/'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/_/ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/_/rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing /_/
[\[121b.6\]]bdud kyi dbang song srog chags thar bar byed/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed/_/khyod kyi lam bstan pas na sangs rgyas bsten/_/mi mchog thar mdzad zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po kam 
[\[121b.7\]]pa la'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_zla ba'i 'od ltar dri med mthu che zhing /_/mi mchog rang byung gyur la zhu bgyi ba/_/rnam 'dren sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na/_/phan par 'jug cing rjes su skye bar 'gyur/_/gal te stong 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]nyid smon med rjes song zhing /_/phung po mtshan ma mi ldan bral ba dang /_/nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos dang rnam shes na/_/pha yi lam du bu yang rjes 'gro 'gyur/_/ston pas legs par gsungs pa de dga' nas/_/dmigs su med pa yi ni sems bskyed 
[\[122a.2\]]do/_/'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/_/rjes su 'thun 'di spyod pa spyad byas shing /_/zhing mchog dag kyang yongs su sbyangs nas su/_/ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste/_/zla bas lhag par phyogs su rnam grags shing /_/srid par 'gro ba'i sems 
[\[122a.3\]]can thar bar byed/_/kam pa la zhes ming btags klu de ni/_/shAkya sras mkhas byang chub lung bstan nas/_/sems ni dga' zhing yongs su yid mgu ste/_/'gro kun thar bar mdzad la mngon bstod pa/_/thub pa che la 'di ltar skyabs su mchi/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the 
[\[122a.4\]]tshom bdag ma mchis/_/mun pa dag la sgron ma gzung bgyi zhing /_/long ba mig ma mchis la lam bstan bgyi/_/de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_mgon po 'jig rten long bar gyur pa'i mig_/mig 
[\[122a.5\]]sbyin sman pa drang srong che la zhu/_/gang gis 'jig rten rnam thar lam bzang zhing /_/zhi ba'i sar mchis rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs/_/stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' rnam par thar ba'i lam ston pa/_/'jig rten mgon po rkang gnyis dbang pos de lung bstan/_/gang gis yun ring zhugs 
[\[122a.6\]]pa'i sdug bsngal lam zhi zhing /_/'khor ba nyer zhi mya ngan 'das pa gsal bar 'gro/_/ston la klu yi rgyal po lam zhi thos nas su/_/sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam pa bskyed byas shing /_/klu yi rgyal pos byang chub 'dun pa drag bskyed de/_/stobs bcu'i stobs 'chang 
[\[122a.7\]]'jig rten mgon du bdag 'gyur byed/_/stobs bcu'i yon tan mnga' bas klu dbang lung bstan pa/_/mi yi seng ge bdag nyid mu stegs dgrar 'gyur zhing /_/sems can mtha' yas dpag med 'khor bar 'gro ba dag_/bde gshegs mchog gi tshig gis 'dren cing thar bar 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]byed/_/ston pa'i gsung mchog klu yi rgyal pos thos nas su/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo thal sbyar te/_/mi dbang 'jig rten mgon po drang srong chen po la/_/gus pa bskyed nas 'khrul med tshig gis mngon bstod pa/_/skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gzhungs mtshungs 
[\[122b.2\]]med ye shes tog_/'gro ba'i dge ba spyod cing dge la yun ring dang /_/'gro ba'i bsam pa mtha' yas khyod kyis thugs chud pas/_/des na mi dbang khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba 
[\[122b.3\]]zhus pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' stobs che stobs dang ldan pa ste/_/thugs dge snang mdzad 'od dang ldan zhing sdig mi mnga'/_/srid rgyal blo gros bzang bas 'gro ba shin tu mkhyen/_/rgyal ba dge spyod shin tu dri med zhal gsungs shig_/mi mchog rdul bral khyod sras ji ltar 
[\[122b.4\]]spyad bgyis na/_/mkhas pa ma dkrugs ma bskyod pa dag thugs chud cing /_/rgyal ba rdul bral dpag med brgya ni yongs su mkhyen/_/rgyal sras skye bo phan mdzad thugs su chud pa'i spyan/_/blo gros dpag med mnga' ba lha mi mkhas pa yis/_/bla mar bgyis shing rgyal ba 
[\[122b.5\]]dpag med sa yas bskor/_/mkhas pa dus su 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba klu yi 'gro ba zhus pa gsungs/_/blo 'chal bral zhing blo gtsang rjes dgongs brtag pa mdzod/_/nga yi sras mchog rgyal bsten rga shi zad byed pa/_/'thob cing 
[\[122b.6\]]rgyal bas mchod cing rdul med skyon bral re/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dpag med brgya shes yongs su 'gro la/_/stobs bcu blo gros mnga' bas klu yi bdag po yis/_/rga shi zad bya thos nas rab tu yid dga' ste/_/'gro la phan yid byang chub yid byas rgyal ba'i mchog_/
[\[122b.7\]]rnam 'dren blo mnga' 'gro la phan mdzad mngon bstod pa/_/'gro ba mang po'i mun pa rab rib ling tog dag_/gcod mdzad 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang /_/rab rib ling tog kun nas sel mdzad bdud rtsi'i lam/_/shin tu dri med spyan mnga' 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]dge ba phyogs bcur ston/_/klu yi bdag po'i gser dngul lta bu'i khyim gshegs shing /_/yon tan dpag med mnga' ba shin tu thugs su chud/_/blo gros ston mdzad 'od zer stong 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal/_/ma 'khrul ma glongs ma smad gzi che 
[\[123a.2\]]mkhas pa'i gzi/_/stobs bcu 'od chen mnga' la 'gro ba'i tshig gis bstod/_/rgyal mchog bdag nyid bde ldan sangs rgyas byang chub nas/_/'gro ba 'khyams shing mngon med rga shi sdug bsngal gyis/_/nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag med bsal te thar bar bgyi/_/bde dang zhi 
[\[123a.3\]]dang zhi ba rdul med rgya che sel/_/zhi ba'i lam du zhugs nas bdag ni sangs rgyas bgyi/_/rgyal ba brgya yis thugs chud bdud kyi stobs dag ni/_/stobs med bgyi zhing mi mkhas pa dag gzhug par bgyi/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po mgrin sngon gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad 
[\[123a.4\]]pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_ston mchog mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la zhu bgyi ba/_/'dren pa khyod kyi sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na/_/kha na ma tho med cing zhi la rdul bral dang /_/nyon mongs med cing byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i don du 'dren pas gsungs pa gang /_/
[\[123a.5\]]dpa' bo khyod nyid las 'khrungs sras thos nas/_/kha na ma tho med cing bdag dang gzhan/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur dang byang chub the tshom khum/_/mgrin sngon klu de yis ni zhus pa dang /_/'jig rten kun la chags pa med pa'i thugs/_/chos rnams kun la mi 'jigs dbang brnyes shing /_/
[\[123a.6\]]ston pa'i gsung la legs gnas lung bstan pa/_/nga sras 'jig rten gsum la ma chags shing /_/'gro la phan par spyad pa spyod byed pa/_/'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang /_/gzugs med khams su'ang ched du mi skye'o/_/mya ngan 'das dbyings gzhal 
[\[123a.7\]]med 'dus ma byas/_/thams cad kyi ni sdug bsngal zad cing 'gog_/de ni nyer bzung 'jig rten gos med yin/_/rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dbang po rab tu bsgom/_/de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/_/gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnam spyod la/_/bdag dang gzhan 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]la gnod pa med gnas te/_/bdag nyid bla med byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/_/de ni rnam smin de las rjes 'thun pa/_/shin tu dka' bas byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/de yi skye bo srog chags lha dang klu/_/mi dang srin po dag gis mi mthong ngo /_/klu mgrin sngon po 
[\[123b.2\]]stobs po che de ni/_/sangs rgyas kun mkhyen gsung gis dga' gyur nas/_/sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar mgo btud de/_/'jig rten sgron mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed/_/mi mchog la ni 'di ltar bdag skyabs mchi/_/yab kyi rjes su sras kyang mchi bgyi zhing /_/mthar 
[\[123b.3\]]bgyid bcom la byang chub 'tshang rgyar bgyi/_/sems can sdug bsngal chos kyis gnod gyur dgrol/_/'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/_/khyod ni ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ste/_/kun tu spyan zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing /_/'gro ba'i srid las sems can grol 
[\[123b.4\]]bar byed/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba yid las 'das/_/ston pa sug las ci bgyis bdag zhu'o/_/rgyal ba de ni snam phyogs gzigs pa na/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[123b.5\]]tsam gyis ni mdun du 'gyur/_/chos la nges pa'i rgyal bas de lung bstan/_/kun mkhyen mkhyen pas bsam pa thugs chud nas/_/bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed mdzad de/_/de bzhin mi mchog gis ni 'di lung bstan/_/bde ba 'byung ba dag gi las byas shing /_/de dag 
[\[123b.6\]]sngan chad yang dang yang dran pas/_/de yi rnam smin las ni 'di ltar shes/_/de yi gzigs pa ras ni 'gyur ba yin/_/rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su/_/klu rgyal de ni mchog tu dga' gyur nas/_/'phags pa'i zang zing med pa'i dga' bskyed de/_/nga rgyal 
[\[123b.7\]]bcom nas sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byed/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_lam stor ba la lam ni rab ston cing /_/'jig rten don mdzad 'dren la zhu bgyi ba/_/sngon tshe rtag tu phrin las ci mdzad na/_/ji 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]ltar dgongs pa bzhin du zhi gnas mdzad/_/'jig rten mgon po rgyal bas de lung bstan/_/sems can klu ni gdul ba'i dus bab cing /_/'gro ba thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir/_/'dren pa bdud stobs 'joms pas lung bstan pa/_/'das pa'i dus su 
[\[124a.2\]]spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/tshul bzhin ma yin sems dang gnyen min pa'i/_/nams kyang mi sems rtag tu zhi gnas bsten/_/de la ngas ni yun ring bslabs pa yin/_/de bzhin rgyal ba dag gi mchod rten la/_/phreng ba rin chen dag ni bkram zhing phul/_/de yis legs 
[\[124a.3\]]pa'i las de byas pas na/_/nyon mongs sems dang nams kyang mi gnas so/_/nga yis bskal pa stong phrag bye ba ru/_/gzhan la gnod pas nams kyang gnod ma byas/_/nga ni de yis las kyi rnam smin rgyus/_/ji ltar bsams bzhin zhi gnas sten par byed/_/drang srong che 
[\[124a.4\]]bas lung bstan 'di thos nas/_/gzi can klu ni dga' bar gyur pa na/_/gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas/_/ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshigs su bcad pas bstod/_/'gro ba'i kun ldang nyon mongs zhi mdzad cing /_/de dag sems zhi khyod kyi bstan pa mdzad/_/
[\[124a.5\]]thub pa nyon mongs med par 'jig rten spyod/_/zla 'od lta bur blo zhi phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_sngon tshe dag tu phrin las ci mdzad na/_/thub pa khyod kyis sku la rdul mi gos/_/dpe 
[\[124a.6\]]med rnams gnon 'di dag bdag la gsungs/_/gang dag thos nas dge ba'i las spyad bgyi/_/rnam par snang byed dge ba tshol ba'i klus/_/'jig rten mgon de la ni zhus pa dang /_/nyon mongs kun sel yan lag brgyad ldan zhing /_/snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgras ni lung bstan pa/_/
[\[124a.7\]]nga yis sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na/_/nams kyang tshul bzhin ma yin ngas ma bsams/_/nams kyang rab tu nyes sems ngas ma bskyed/_/bla med byams las yang dang yang du byas/_/nga yis dge ba'i las de byas pas na/_/bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su/_/mi mchog 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]rgyal ba thub pa'i sku dag dang /_/na bza' la yang rdul gyis mi gos so/_/rgyal ba'i phrin las dge bsags de thos nas/_/rnam par snang byed klu ni yid dga' ste/_/sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo yis/_/rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed/_/legs so rgyal 
[\[124b.2\]]ba mu byed sngon du gshegs/_/khyod kyis rgya che mtha' yas don dag mdzad/_/srid pa'i tshogs la dga' zhing sdug bsngal gyis/_/gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag khyod kyis bkrol/_/skye bo dug gdug rig pa'i sman pa ste/_/skye bo dug bcom khyod ni gso sman lags/_/me 
[\[124b.3\]]'bar zhi ltar rim gyis mya ngan 'da'/_/'di ltar thal sbyar mgos btud skyabs su mchi/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_/rnam 'dren dge ba'i phrin las ci mdzad na/_/zhabs ni shin tu mnyam zhing 
[\[124b.4\]]brtan pa brnyes/_/gang dag thos nas shin tu yid dga' 'thob/_/mi yi mchog gyur de dag bdag la gsungs/_/klu yi rgyal po bsgyings pas rnam par 'dren/_/'jig rten mkhas la de yis zhus pa dang /_/yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis/_/klu 
[\[124b.5\]]yi rgyal po yid ni dga' bar gyur/_/nga yis tshul khrims brtul zhugs rnam dag bsgrubs/_/nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bsgoms/_ngas ni dge ba'i las de byas pas na/_/rkang pa mnyam pa dag gis sa la reg_/de tshe thams cad mkhyen pas lung 
[\[124b.6\]]bstan pa/_/rdul bral klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas/_/gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' ste/_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed/_/legs so rgyal ba 'od mdzad rdul bcom zhing /_/shin tu nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa bcom/_/zla nya'i dkyil 
[\[124b.7\]]'khor sgra gcan gyis btang ltar/_/dgra bcom nas ni phyogs rnams rab tu gsal/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/_/'jig rten 'das gsung 'dren la zhu bgyi 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]ba/_/rkang gnyis dam pa sug las ci bgyis na/_/rnam 'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'thob/_/sngon tshe dag tu spyad pa spyod pa na/_/lus dang ngag yid dang ni sems kyis kyang /_/bde ba 'byung ba'i yang dag las byas te/_/las gang byas pas 
[\[125a.2\]]nams kyang gdung mi 'gyur/_/rab tu dga' zhing dge bas brlan pa dang /_/gnas ma yin pa'i lam gyod thams cad ni/_/dge bcu las kyi lam gyis rnam par sbyangs/_/gnas ma yin pa'i nyon mongs thams cad bcom/_/rnam 'dren de yis las de mdzad pas na/_/'di nas 
[\[125a.3\]]'phos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs/_/mi yi 'jig rten brnyes nas der 'das te/_/bla med gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'thob/_/gnas ma yin pa shes la nams kyang ni/_/bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis bskyod mi nus/_/sems dang de bzhin nyon mongs yid grol te/_/
[\[125a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu mkhyen/_/ston pas lung bstan pas ni 'od chen klu/_/yid ni mgu zhing shin tu dga' 'gyur te/_/gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas/_/yon tan pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal byed/_/shin tu thugs dul yid 
[\[125a.5\]]gnyis 'joms pa po/_/'dam las rgal cing skams la shin tu bzhugs/_/thub chen rgal cing 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa/_/ji ltar nyi mas mun pa bsal nas su/_/gzugs kyi rnam pa snang zhing gsal ba ltar/_/de bzhin ston pa'i thugs ni rnam grol zhing /_/sems can 
[\[125a.6\]]sdug bsngal mang gnod mthar mdzad pa/_/mig sbyin gso ba'i dpyad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdung byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_rgyal ba gser mdog phrin las ci mdzad na/_/dus gsum mkhyen 
[\[125a.7\]]la rab tu brtan par bzhugs/_/nam mkha' lta bur mkhyen ldan zhu bgyis pa/_/'gro ba'i 'dren pas de dag bdag la gsungs/_/thogs med mkhyen pas thugs ni ma chags shing /_/som nyi gcod la the tsom sel mdzad pa/_/rgyal ba rang byung thugs kyis de'i bsam 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]pa/_/shin tu thugs chud de ni lung bstan pa/_/rtag tu dge ba dran ldan sten byed cing /_/nges pa'i las byas pas ni bde 'byung dang /_/rtag tu gzhan yang shes la 'jog byed cing /_/bdag nyid ji tsam shes pa ser sna med/_/mkhas pa de yis las de byas pas na/_/
[\[125b.2\]]lus zhig nas ni gzhan 'phrul dag tu 'gro/_/'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha gnas dang /_/thur du 'bab cing mi yi bar du 'byung /_/dus gsum shes la rnam par rtse byed cing /_/bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang shes par byed/_/pags pa srab cing blo dang ldan gyur pa/_/bde 
[\[125b.3\]]gshegs thogs pa med pas lung bstan to/_/shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan thos nas/_/klu chen rab tu gdung byed dga' gyur te/_/byang chub gzhal du med la rab gnas shing /_/yang dag bsngags pas mi mchog rgyal ba bstod/_/dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig tu 
[\[125b.4\]]gzigs mdzad cing /_/las dang rnam smin de bzhin rab tu mkhyen/_/sems can dag gi khyad par bde ba mkhyen/_/bde gshegs thams cad gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_/
[\[125b.5\]]mi mchog mchog rab mkhyen rab mtha' yas pa/_/mgon po rdul bral thugs ni yongs su dag_/bdag gi som nyi myur sol the tsom yang /_/skyen par dgum phyir bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/_/ji ltar sngon tshe mi dang lha dag gis/_/sug las bgyis pa blo mkhas ji 
[\[125b.6\]]ltar 'tshal/_/ji ltar bla med byang chub mchog thob pa/_/bdag gis the tsom zhus pa myur bar gsungs/_/stobs bcu'i stobs mkhyen bdag nyid shin tu nges/_/rgyal la klu yis zhus pa myur gsung ste/_/nga yis ji ltar mi yi spyod kun dang /_/dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub tshol 
[\[125b.7\]]byed cing /_/ji ltar yid rab dga' bas bsgrubs pa dang /_/ji ltar skye dgu sdug bsngal gyis gnod cing /_/tha ma mthong la ngan 'gror ltung ba dang /_/nyon mongs brgya yis mun par gyur pa shes/_/der ni sems can snying pos snying rje bskyed/_/nga yis sems can 'di dag sdug 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]bsngal dgrol/_/thar bar 'gyur ba'i lam mchog dag tu bzhag_/nga yis ngan 'gro dag gi lam ngan dgag_/nga yis lam mchog zhi ba rab tu bstan/_/bde ba'i lam gyis byang chub zhi bar bkur/_/stobs bcu'i lam mchog rab tu bstan bya zhing /_/
[\[126a.2\]]yun ring mi dag gis ni don 'gyur bya/_/de ltar brtan pa des ni snying rje bskyed/_/drang srong chen pos dge tshul bsgrubs nas su/_/mgo dang mig dang de bzhin sha dag ni/_/btang nas bde gshegs lam nas dpa' bo 'gro/_/sngon gyi dus su mi yis spyad pa ni/_/de tshe 
[\[126a.3\]]rmi lam lta bur rab tu mkhyen/_/dge ba 'di dag mi yis shes pa na/_/stobs bcu mnga' la mchod pa rtsol bar byed/_/mgon la gzhal med de bzhin dad bskyed nas/_/ji ltar 'gro kun mgon du bdag 'gyur snyam/_/ji ltar skye bo phongs tshe bdag gis ni/_/stobs bcus 
[\[126a.4\]]bstan pa'i lam la gzhag par bya/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bsten pa na/_/'dren pa dag gis spyad la rjes su bslab/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas su/_/lam gol song ba rnams la lam mchog bstan/_/'di ltar bdag nyid chen po'i spyad spyod na/_/mi yis 
[\[126a.5\]]sngon gyi phrin las byas pa mthong /_/rmi lam lta bur byas par rnam rig cing /_/de ni dran la pha rol dag la'ang ston/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bka' ni thos nas su/_/stobs chen klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas/_/sor bcu'i thal mo spyi bor sbyar btud de/_/byang chub zhi thob bya 
[\[126a.6\]]phyir rgyal ba bstod/_/rnam par 'dren la bdag gis dad bskyed pas/_/stobs bcu'i mdzad pa dag ni bdag gis bgyi/_/skye bo lam gol 'gro zhing mun gyur rnams/_/byang chub zhi ba thob par bdag gis bgyi/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po sprin chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su 
[\[126a.7\]]bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba skye bo yongs grol mdzad/_/'dren pa rang byung la ni bdag 'di zhu/_/ji ltar ston pa'i sras kyis brtson bskyed na/_/zhi ba rdul med byang chub mchog 'thob 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus stobs kyis su/_/
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]bla med byang chub byang chub sems 'thob pa/_/yon tan dpag med ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i/_/drang srong chen pos sras zhus lung bstan pa/_/byang chub don du nga yis sngon spyad pa/_/ji ltar 'gro ba rnams su stobs brtson bsten/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyi byang chub ngas brnyes pa/_/
[\[126b.2\]]de ni nga yis cung zad bshad par bya/_/'das pa'i dus su mi bdag byung ba ni/_/mi yi dbang phyug mi dbang stobs 'chang zhes/_/rin chen bdun yod bu dang ldan pa ste/_/bdag las skyes pa khri phrag brgya dag byung /_/de tshe 'jig rten khams 'di 'ang rgyas pa ste/_/ri bong bdag 
[\[126b.3\]]ces sangs rgyas zhing dag byung /_/der ni mi mchog rang byung byung gyur pa/_/rin chen dpal zhes 'jig rten sgra rnams grags/_/mi mchog de yis nyan thos dge 'dun ni/_/sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ngo /_/bde gshegs mchog gi rjes skyes sras tshogs ni/_/nyon mongs 
[\[126b.4\]]khro dang nga rgyal 'chab bral ba'i/_/de tshe mi mchog de yi byang chub sems/_/sa ya phrag ni brgyad cu dag byung ste/_/rgyal ba dpag med dag la spyad ldan zhing /_/'gro la phan phyir byang chub 'thob 'gyur ro/_/de na rnam par 'dren pa de yi ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud bsten 
[\[126b.5\]]zhes bya byung /_/drang srong chen po bdud stobs rab 'joms pa/_/de yis tshogs kyi gtso bo de byed do/_/de nas bdud stobs bsnyen par dka' zhes pa/_/lha'i bu byung nas 'dren pa rgyal ba'i mchog_/de ni byang chub mchog tu gshegs pa la/_/ji ltar mi reg bya phyir bar chad byed/_/
[\[126b.6\]]sa 'di rgya mtshor bcas pa yon tan ldan/_/de dag bud med tshogs kyis mngon sprul te/_/bzang mo yon tan rab mchog 'dzin pas bkang /_/dga' ba'i tshig dang yid 'ong tshig smra zhing /_/mig ni bzang la 'gros kyang ldem bag can/_/glang po'i sna ltar lag mnyam pa yi 
[\[126b.7\]]mdog_/yun ring dag tu brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ste/_/nu ma sra la legs dang ldan pa yin/_/ngag tshig snyan cing pad ma 'dra ba'i mig_/so yi phreng ba thags dam 'chang ba ste/_/byi ru'i mdog ltar mchu ni mdzes pa yin/_/bzhin dang 'gram pa dag ni mdzes dang ldan/_/
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]bzhin gyi mdog ni zla ba dri med 'phrog_/'dzum zhing tshig ni snyan pa gtong ba ste/_/glang mchog myos pa lta bur mdzes pa'i 'gros/_/ngo tsha shes pas blo gros ngan pa spangs/_/nu ma sra zhing tshigs kyis zin pa ste/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po lta bur 
[\[127a.2\]]de'i lus 'chang /_/bzang mo'i lus ngos srab cing 'jam dang ldan/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po'i byin 'dra rtse 'gro zhing /_/rkang pa mnyam la 'jol ba'i thabs su 'gro/_/'dod chags ldang bar 'gyur ba'i bu mo dag_/bdud kyis sa rnams thams cad gang byas pa/_/dmar 
[\[127a.3\]]ba zung du ldan pa'i myos ma ste/_/bdud kyis bdud kyi zhags pa mdun du bstan/_/de yi 'dod pa bdud stobs thams cad dag_/de tshe bskyed nas bdud bsten 'jigs byas kyang /_/nag po'i rtsa lag de yis gtse ma nus/_/bar chad bya bar rab tu ma tshugs so/_/de nas 
[\[127a.4\]]shin tu mi bzad srin po ni/_/bye ba dag gis tshig rtsub smra bar byed/_/dpag tu med cing bsam yas mu med pa'i/_/lus bong mtha' yas mngon sprul tshig rtsub smra/_/mdung thung mda' bo che yis rgyob shig rgyob/_/'di yi [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]myur du ri yis chom/_/'di yi 
[\[127a.5\]]snying la gzi brjid yod pa phrogs/_/myur du dus las 'da' zhing 'gog par gyis/_/thang cig tsam yang 'di ni srog ma sbyin/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan de bsten na/_/bdag gi rgyal srid gnod pa med par 'gyur/_/nga yi yang dag tshig de thos nas su/_/
[\[127a.6\]]rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'phel bar ma byed cig_/de tshe bong bu'i rnam pa mngon sprul pa/_/mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa dag byung /_/srin po rnams ni sgra bo che dag 'bod/_/la la mdung dang mda' bo che dag thogs/_/la la dag kyang ri ni khyer ba ste/_/la la sdang ba'i 
[\[127a.7\]]sems kyis sprul 'dzin cing /_/de yi mdun du shin tu sgra dag 'byin/_/de tshe la la gnod sbyin mngon sprul te/_/lus gcig pa dang lus gnyis lag pa ni/_/gsum dag yod cing lus bzhi lag pa gcig_/de tshe lus gcig mngon par sprul byas shing /_/de tshe de bzhin 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]mgo bzhi mngon par sprul/_/de nas lus gcig mngon par sprul byas te/_/de dag bong bu ra dang byi la dang /_/stag gi gdong ste 'jigs par byed pa dag_/so so mi 'dra ba yi skad dag 'byin/_/bong bu'i gdong ni ra yi skad 'byin cing /_/ra yi gdong ni bong bu'i skad 'byin la/_/
[\[127b.2\]]bong bu glang po'i skad dang rta skad 'byin/_/bong bu gcig gi kha nas skad kun 'byin/_/de tshe ra yi kha nas thams cad skad/_/shin tu 'jigs skad dpag tu med pa 'byin/_/gzhan yang bde gshegs bsnyen par bya ba'i phyir/_/glang po kha nas tshig rtsub dpag med 'byin/_/de tshe 
[\[127b.3\]]glang po bong bu'i skad 'byin cing /_/de bzhin rta dang de bzhin glang po dag_/rnam pa mtha' yas skad dag 'byin byed kyang /_/bde gshegs ba spu'i khung bu 'ang ma g.yos so/_/rta ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin byed cing /_/de bzhin spre'u ni rta yi skad dag 'byin/_/spre'u'i kha nas mtha' yas 
[\[127b.4\]]skad 'byin kyang /_/bde gshegs ba spu'i khung yang g.yos ma gyur/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po wa yi skad 'byin cing /_/bong bu'i phyugs dang bya byi rta skad 'byin/_/de tshe rnam 'dren gtse bar ma nus shing /_/ba spu'i khung bu'ang g.yos par ma gyur to/_/de tshe stag ni phag gi skad 'byin cing /_/
[\[127b.5\]]de tshe phyugs dang bya ni sbrul skad 'byin/_/rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khyu mchog seng ge'i skad 'byin cing /_/byi la wa ni phag gi skad 'byin la/_/ma he dag ni stag gi skad 'byin kyang /_/'jig rten mkhas pa bar chad bya 
[\[127b.6\]]ma nus/_/de bzhin phyugs kyi kha nas mtha' yas pa/_/rnam pa bye ba sems can skad 'byin kyang /_/rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/stag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]khyu mchog skad 'byin cing /_/de bzhin bong bu'i skad dang rta yi skad/_/de tshe dom ni 
[\[127b.7\]]seng ge'i skad 'byin kyang /_/'jig rten phan mdzad ba spu'i khung ma g.yos/_/dred ni nam mkha' lding gi skad 'byin cing /_/de tshe de bzhin glang po rta skad 'byin/_/rnam 'dren de ni gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/nam mkha' lding ni khu byug skad 'byin cing /_/
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]de bzhin ne tso phyugs bzhon skad 'byin la/_/ne tso'i skad ni yang dag skad 'byin byed/_/shang shang te'u'i skad rnams 'byin par byed/_/de tshe ka la ping ka'i yang dag skad/_/de tshe mtshan mo gang la zhe sa'i skad/_/de tshe nyams su dga' ba rma bya'i skad/_/de bzhin 
[\[128a.2\]]tsan tsa'i skad dang shugs kyi skad/_/phyugs bzhon zhe sa'i skad dag 'byin par byed/_/de tshe ka la ping ka yid 'ong dga'/_/ko ka'i tshig rtsub dag ni 'byin byed kyang /_/rgyal ba'i thugs ni gzhan du ma gyur to/_/sbrul ni glang po'i skad dag 'byin byed cing /_/de bzhin glang po sbrul gyi skad 'byin 
[\[128a.3\]]kyang /_/rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/de tshe ngang pa seng ge'i skad 'byin cing /_/de bzhin khyim bya khra yi skad 'byin kyang /_/rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad bya ba dag tu 'ang ma tshugs so/_/rta ni dre'u yi skad dag 'byin 
[\[128a.4\]]byed cing /_/de bzhin tsan tsa go bo'i skad 'byin kyang /_/rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad bya ba dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/glang po 'ug pa tsan tsa'i skad 'byin cing /_/bya dang khyu mchog skad 'byin khrung khrung skad/_/de tshe bya rgod 'dzim+ha'i skad 'byin cing /_/bya dang khyu mchog 
[\[128a.5\]]b+he ri'i skad 'byin la/_/ngang pa'i kha nas skad rnams thams cad 'byin/_/de bzhin khu byug gnod sbyin kun gyi skad/_/de tshe grul bum thams cad skad 'byin cing /_/de bzhin kha gcig nas ni skad kun 'byin/_/kha yi rnam pa de las de skad 'byin/_/skad cig tu ni mtha' yas skad 'byin kyang /_/
[\[128a.6\]]rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/klu yi kha nas rdo yi char 'bebs shing /_/de bzhin mtshon cha drag po'i char 'bebs kyang /_/rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/gnod sbyin kha nas rdo 
[\[128a.7\]]yi char 'bebs shing /_/de bzhin me rab 'bar ba'i char 'bebs la/_/de bzhin ri dang phyag dar char 'bebs kyang /_/bde gshegs bar chad bya bar ma nus so/_/grul bum mda' yi char dang de bzhin du/_/me 'bar dang ni mtshon cha'i char 'bebs kyang /_/rnam 'dren de la gtse bar ma nus shing /_/bar 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]chad byed pa dag tu'ang ma tshugs so/_/de tshe bdud ni sdig can de yis su/_shin tu mi bzad rnam pas gtses byas kyang /_/brtson 'grus dpag med stobs ni bskyed nas su/_/bdud stobs sten pa byang chub rtogs par chud/_/rang byung gis ni bdud sde spa bkong zhing /_/ljon 
[\[128b.2\]]mchog drung du skyil mo dbyer med bcas/_/spun pa rlung gis phyar ltar bcom nas su/_/byang chub mchog reg skye dgu thugs su chud/_/de tshe sa ni rnam drug rab g.yos shing /_/bsnyen par dka' ba'i sde de phyogs 'tshol to/_/rlung gi rgyal pos bya ni khyer ba ltar/_/bde bar gshegs 
[\[128b.3\]]pa'i gzi yis rnam par bcom/_/klu dang gnod sbyin srin po de dag gis/_/de tshe sna tshogs gdong ni mngon par sprul/_/de dag bdud bsten pa yi gzi brjid kyis/_/kha na byed pa yod pa de dag bcom/_/ji ltar nga yis bdud kyi bu mo bcom/_/bud med 'di dag bdag gis der rgas nas/_/
[\[128b.4\]]de bzhin bdud stobs bsnyen dka' rang gis sprul/_/bdud stobs bsten pa'i mthu yis bcom par gyur/_/bde gshegs mchog la lha yis bu sprul bkang /_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas zil gyis mnan/_/lha yi bu mo khri phrag brgyad cu kun/_/bdud bsten pas ni byang chub 
[\[128b.5\]]dag la btsud/_/rnam par btul cing byang chub mi g.yo gnas/_/de tshe bsnyen par dka' ba sdug bsngal gyur/_/de yi tshe na bdud bsten byung nas su/_/'gro ba de dag bdag gis grol bar byas/_/de ltar nga yis brtson 'grus bskyed pas su/_/de tshe thub par dka' ba'i bdud las rgyal/_/
[\[128b.6\]]rdul bral zhi mchog byang chub tshol ba na/_/nga yi sras kyis de ltar bslab par bya/_/sems can bye ba mang po'i don bya zhing /_/nams kyang bdag gi phyir ni bde mi bya/_/ji ltar mgo la me 'bar gzhan mi sems/_/skyes bus zhi bya lta bur brtson 'grus bskyed/_/de ltar zhi ba mchog dag tshol 
[\[128b.7\]]ba na/_/yid kyis yid kyis rnam par bsam par byos/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po zla ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_/mi dang lha yi ston pa kha lo sgyur/_/lha dang bcas pa 'gro 'di'i 'dren pa ste/_/ji ltar bde gshegs bdag 'khrungs dran ldan 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]pa/_/bla med byang chub thob pa bdag gis zhu/_/'dren pa thub pas 'dir ni srid las rgyal/_/ji ltar 'dren pa bde gshegs bdag la 'khrungs/_/bdud ni rmongs mdzad mya ngan 'das reg pa/_/rgyal ba gang zag mchog gis lung bstan pa/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[129a.2\]]la dran bsdams na/_/nyes bcas 'khor ba'i 'gro ba 'gag par 'gyur/_/skye bo mi mkhas gang la chags gyur pa/_/bde ba rab tu mi shes sdug bsngal reg_/dran pa nyams pa 'khor ba de dang der/_/mi mkhas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rjes su dran/_/rmongs pa de ni thar ba'i 'gro mi shes/_/
[\[129a.3\]]nyon mongs bdud kyi spyod yul dag la dga'/_/log pa rnam par nyams pa'i yid kyis su/_/mi rtag rtag dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang /_/bdag med bdag dang mi gtsang gtsang 'dzin pa/_/nyon mongs bdud kyi yul las mi 'grol lo/_/rab nyams de dag gis ni 'gro ba shes/_/
[\[129a.4\]]dran pa nyer gzhag lam ni rab tu shes/_/spyad pa spyod tshe 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub byed pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa klus thos nas/_/byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed/_/klu chen zla bas mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[129a.5\]]rgyal la bstod/_/dran pa nyams pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa lags/_/dran stobs shin tu gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub gzhal du med par 'dun pa bskyed/_/dran pa nyams pa med pa'i 'gro ba bstan/_/byang chub gzhal du med la 'dun pa bskyed/_/byang chub dran 
[\[129a.6\]]ldan gnas la reg par bgyi/_/bdud stobs bdud dpung bcas gzhom spang bya zhing /_/bdud kyis dam du bcings pa'i sems can dgrol/_/rgyal ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mkhyen/_/klu de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas su/_/sems can phan phyir klu chen zla ba ni/_/'dren 
[\[129a.7\]]pas gzhal med byang chub lung bstan pa/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu la/_/klu bdag de yis sngon ni bsnyen bkur byas/_/'di nas phyis ni sangs rgyas bye ba bcu/_/byang chub zhi ba tshol tshe mchod pa byed/_/phyi nas de ni gzhal med byang chub reg_/rgyal ba'i mtshan ni zla bzang 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]zhes bya ste/_/bdud kyi stobs ni shin tu stobs nyams byed/_/bdud kyi stobs ni rgyal ba'i stobs byed 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs 'di thos nas/_/klu ni bye ba byang chub mchog la gnas/_/sngon med byang chub la ni yid zhugs te/_/sangs rgyas legs par 
[\[129b.2\]]gsungs la'ang mngon par dga'/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po tshogs byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_/rgyal ba nyid 'khrungs yang dag 'du gyur pa/_/ma 'khrul sems kyis spyad pa spyod pa na/_/bdud kyi stobs bcas dpung bcas 
[\[129b.3\]]bcom nas su/_/bla med byang chub zhi ba ji ltar 'thob/_/bde ba'i sems ni g.yo bar mi bya zhing /_/nyon mongs bdud kyis stobs ni rnam par spang /_/mnyam gzhag rgyal ba'i spyad pa spyod byed pa/_/de ni myur du byang chub zhi 'thob 'gyur/_/lung bstan pas ni klu de dag 'gyur nas/_/
[\[129b.4\]]rgyal ba'i byang chub la ni yid 'jug cing /_/mnyam gzhag bdud kyi spyod yul las ni 'byung /_/'dren la bsam gtan tshul gyis mngon bstod pa/_/spyod yul dang ni spyod yul ma yin mkhyen/_/gang dag 'jig rten 'dren pa khyod kyis bslabs/_/'gro ba de dag bdud kyi yul 
[\[129b.5\]]las thar/_/chags med thugs kyis dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ring slan chad rgyal ba'i spyod yul la/_/spyad par bgyi zhing bdud kyi spyod yul spang /_/bdud kyi spyod yul las ni 'gro ba dgrol/_/bde gshegs spyod yul la ni yang dag dgod/_/gang zag mchog 
[\[129b.6\]]gis klu yi bdag po yi/_/bsam pa mkhyen nas byang chub lung bstan pa/_/gang dag nyon mongs bdud kyi yul la brten/_/bye ba tham pa'i klu ni yang dag gnas/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba 
[\[129b.7\]]zhus pa/_mi dag 'di ru shes rab la spyod pa/_/'dod la chags med spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/bdud kyi stobs bcus dpung bcas bcom nas su/_/byang chub gzhal med nyes med ji ltar 'thob/_/'gro kun sgyu ma 'dra bar sus shes pa/_/de ni bdud kyi zhags pas 'ching mi byed/_/
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]'gro ba 'di dag bdud kyis bcings mthong nas/_/snying rje bskyed de dka' thub mchog la spyod/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems rangs te/_/rgyal ba thub la mkhyen pas bstod nas su/_/byang chub 
[\[130a.2\]]gzhol ba la ni yid bskyod do/_/klu yi bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chud nas/_/'dren pas byang chub mchog la lung bstan to/_/klu ni bye ba byang chub mchog la gnas/_/'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying pos bcom ldan 
[\[130a.3\]]'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_'dren pa thabs la mkhas pa bdag la gsungs/_/thabs gang gis ni spyod pa spyad bgyis na/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub las mi ldog_/mi mchog 'di dag bdag la bka' stsol cig_/ji ltar 
[\[130a.4\]]yid ni rab tu mi ldog pa/_/bde gshegs gang zag mchog ni khyod las su/_/gang dag thos nas thabs mkhas mnyam par rtsom/_/spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni skyo mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba mi mkhas lam ngan zhugs pa yi/_/'gro ba rnam par nyams la snying rje bskyed/_/'gro la 
[\[130a.5\]]phan phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos/_/bdag nyid yongs su btang ste tshol bar byed/_/chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo shes pa na/_/bdag nyid gtong la zhum par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos ni g.yo ba med par shes pa na/_/de bzhin sems can rnams la rab tu ston/_/chung ma bu dang 
[\[130a.6\]]bu mo bdag nyid kyi/_/mgo yang yongs su gtong la mi zhum mo/_/de ni gang du'ang gnas par mi 'jug ste/_/bdag med 'du shes kyis ni yid la gnas/_/de ni phung po bdag med rab tu ston/_/zang zing med pa'i bde ba'i mchog 'thob bo/_/de tshe sems can bye ba dpag med 
[\[130a.7\]]dag_/smin par byed la dga' zhing zhum pa med/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de mgu gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas la ni snying nas skyabs song zhing /_/byang chub gzhol la yid ni bskyed pa dang /_/'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de lung bstan/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po gzung bar dka' bas bcom 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_bde gshegs khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bde bas sgrub par bgyid/_/ji ltar thub pa gshegs ltar myur du mchi/_/dpag med gshegs pa de dag bdag la gsungs/_/rgyal ba mi mchog 
[\[130b.2\]]rang byung mkhyen pas su/_/byang chub nges la de ni lung bstan pa/_/ji ltar rigs su byang chub spyod pa na/_/nams kyang 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams mi reg_/byams pa'i stobs kyis phan par spyod pa na/_/byams pa'i sems ni gar yang mi rmongs so/_/byams pa la ni sdug bsngal mi 
[\[130b.3\]]'byung zhing /_/nyes pa rab zhi spyod pa mi g.yo'o/_/spyod tshe sems can kun la rab tu ston/_/byams pa sgoms shig gar yang ma g.yo shig_/rab tu zhi ba'i yid kyis nyes pa chom/_/sems can rnams la phan phyir zhi ba btsal/_/de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na/_/spyad pa 
[\[130b.4\]]spyod tshe sdug bsngal mi 'thob cing /_/gzhal med byang chub myur du gso bar byed/_/de yi 'khor ni thams cad 'thun par 'gyur/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/shin tu zhi ba'i yid kyis nyes pa spangs/_/byams pa'i sems kyis nyes pa rnam par btul/_/byang chub 
[\[130b.5\]]gzhol ba la ni yid bskyed do/_/rgyal ba snga phyi mkhas pas de'i bsam pa/_/rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis nyon mongs btul/_/yongs su dag la shin tu gnas mkhyen nas/_/byang chub mchog la klu ni lung bstan pa/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad cu ru/_/byams pa bsten nas ma 
[\[130b.6\]]'ongs dus su ni/_/rgyal ba thugs dag zhes bya dbang po btul/_/lha dang mi dag gis ni mchod par 'gyur/_/mchog tu dga' ba rab tu mgu sems kyis/_/rgyal ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di yis rgyal ba bstod/_/rab tu thugs dag nongs pa 
[\[130b.7\]]shin tu btul/_/gti mug rnam par bcom zhing bdud las rgyal/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i thugs rje can/_/nyes pa'i dug spangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po thams cad rgyags pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_spyad 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]pa spyod pa'i tshe na thabs gang gis/_/bdud kyi spyod yul dbang du mi 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni bsrungs 'gyur ba/_/bde gshegs thub chen sangs rgyas la zhu'o/_/rgyal bas de yi bsam pa mkhyen pa na/_/chags med ye shes kun tu spyan mnga' ba/_/
[\[131a.2\]]bsod nams brgya mtshan phan pa'i thugs rje can/_/sangs rgyas stobs la mkhas pas lung bstan pa/_/rtag tu de ni dran pa nyer gzhag na/_/nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang du bya ba med/_/rtag tu rnam dag sems kyis dran spyod na/_/des na bdud kyi dbang du de mi 'khrid/_/rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig 
[\[131a.3\]]de thos nas su/_/ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas/_/rab tu sems dang tshig ni gtsang ba dang /_/ma smad pa yis bde gshegs mngon par bstod/_/srid pa'i skye la rgyal ba thugs brtse ldan/_/sems can lam ngan rab zhugs gzigs nas su/_/the tsom sel 
[\[131a.4\]]cing yongs su dgyes thugs kyis/_/rgyal bas bstan pa'i lam la sems can rnams/_/khyod kyis legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su/_/rgyal ba'i chos btsal spyod pa spyad par bgyi/_/bdud kyi stobs bcas dpung bcas bcom nas su/_/sdug bsngal chos grol 
[\[131a.5\]]sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po char chen po spyod pa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_skye dgu dag la byams thugs skyabs kyi mchog_/kun du spyan mnga' rgyal mchog thugs rje can/_/rdul bral byang chub la ni ji 
[\[131a.6\]]ltar spyad/_/stobs bcu ye shes phung po khyod la zhu/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag gi the tshom khum/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa rnam par mkhyen/_/bde bar gshegs pas klu de dga' gyur nas/_/rang sems shes par bya phyir brtson 'grus brtan/_/ji ltar bde bar gshegs 
[\[131a.7\]]pas bstan ltar bslabs/_/rang sems shes par bya phyir nges par gyur/_/rgyal bas bstan pa'i lam ni thos nas 'dug_/yongs su mgu ba'i yid kyis the tsom bsal/_/dga' bas sa la pus mo btsugs nas su/_/rnam 'dren 'jig rten phan mdzad mngon bstod pa/_/nyon mongs thams cad 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]bsal ba bla na med/_/khyod 'dra ma mchis gong na ga la mchis/_/ma smad sems can yid ni dga' bar mdzad/_/bde gshegs byang chub mi bzad phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyi bsam pa mkhyen/_las kyang mkhyen/_smon lam dag kyang mkhyen te/_lha 
[\[131b.2\]]dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don chen po mdzad nas/_/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ltos shig_/klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa las 'dul ba thos nas/_/'dul ba'i rtags dag ston par byed/_rjes su chags pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/_
[\[131b.3\]]rjes su 'dzin pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/_'dren pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/_/rnam par 'dren pa'i rtags dag ston par byed/_mur byed pa'i rtags dag ston par byed de/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/klu'i rgyal po de 
[\[131b.4\]]dag thams cad kyang /_/sems can rnams kyi don byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[131b.5\]]sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bar dang /_bcom ldan 'das gzi brjid chen po'i bar dag ngo mtshar che lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das phrin las kyi rnam par smin pa gang 
[\[131b.6\]]gis bcom ldan 'das gnas mkhyen pa grub lags/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te lung bstan du gsol/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[131b.7\]]pa'i byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes pas spyad pa spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu legs so legs so/_/maud 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]gal gyi bu khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/_maud gal gyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/_khyod de bzhin gshegs 
[\[132a.2\]]pa la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni/_legs so/_/maud gal gyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[132a.3\]]'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maud gal gyi bu nga gnas shes par bya ba'i don du 'das pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas te yongs su zhus so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag gi rnam 
[\[132a.4\]]grangs des na maud gal gyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 'dzin ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[132a.5\]]skyes bu 'dul ba/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 'dzin de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug byung ngo /_/
[\[132a.6\]]de'i tshe bram ze ud pa la'i mig ces bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang byung ste/_de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'dzin nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gtsug lag khang dbul ba phul nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 
[\[132a.7\]]dang bcas pa'i gnas bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gnas shes pa thob par gyur cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'dzin pa des nga la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su gnang ste/_ud pa la'i mig legs so legs so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ud pa la'i mig khyod 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gnas shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bsam gtan pa yi gnas byas shing /_/gtsug lag khang ni phul ba yi/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis na/_/
[\[132b.2\]]ngas ni gnas kyi shes pa bsgrubs/_/ngas dge ba'i rtsa ba de bskyed nas/_'di ltar sems bskyed de sems can gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas shes pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ste ngas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams 
[\[132b.3\]]de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa 'grub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gnas ni shes par bya ba'i phyir/_/gang dag 
[\[132b.4\]]g.yel ba med spyod pa/_/de yi spyod la rjes yi rang /_/nga'i sems rnam par ma g.yos shing /_/dge la rjes su yi rang ste/_/mi dbang de yi spyod pa la/_/bsam pas rjes su yi rang nas/_/ngas ni de ltar kun 'byung grub/_/nga rtag par rgyun du khams gsum la ma chags pa'i yid kyis 
[\[132b.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ste/_de dag gi rnam par smin pa la the tsom med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes pa 'gog pa shes pa thugs su chud do/_/lam de yang brtson 'grus brtsams pas thugs su chud kyi le los ni ma yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas shes 
[\[132b.6\]]pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa thugs su chud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gnas dang kun 'byung shes pa dang /_/de bzhin 'gog pa dag la yang /_/lam gang gis ni de 'thob pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog ni de mkhyen to/_/
[\[132b.7\]]shes pa de dang ldan pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa/_/'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/'dren pas de ni grol bar byed/_/maud gal gyi bu nga gnas ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa dag bskyed de/_maud gal gyi bu sngon 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa zhes bya ba ston pa 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gcig ni drug khri brgyad stong byung ngo /_/
[\[133a.2\]]de'i tshe na khyim bdag thos spyod ces bya ba zhig kyang byung ste/_des de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par spyod pa de'i yo byad thams cad sbyar nas smon lam 'di skad btab bo/_/bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi gnas pa'i chos thob par gyur cig ces btab ste/_de'i rgyur byas pa'i chos 
[\[133a.3\]]gang la yang smon lam ma btab bo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa des nga srid pa pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_skye ba thams cad la gang gi gzhi'i gnas ldog pa ni nga la med de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa thugs su chud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[133a.4\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/rten pa med pa'i sems kyis su/_/tshul khrims bzod pa'i stobs la brten/_/gang gis 'gro ba spungs byas pa/_/gnas ma yin gyi shes pa thob/_/ngas sems can dpag tu med pa dag gnas ma yin pa shes pa la 
[\[133a.5\]]btsud cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bskyed la/_nga dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang gus par rjes su yi rang ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa mngon par grub bo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[133a.6\]]ma gtogs par phung po dag mngon par 'grub par byed pa gar yang ma bsngos so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon par grub bo/_/nga lam gyi shes pa 'di bsgrub pa'i don du 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa dag mngon par 'dus byas 
[\[133a.7\]]pa ni maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa zug rngu 'byin ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i nyan thos 'bum tshang bar byung ngo /_/de'i tshe dbang pos byin zhes bya ba bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang byung ste/_de de bzhin gshegs 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]pa zug rngu 'byin pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i yo byad thams cad lo khrir sbyar to/_/maud gal gyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang pos byin zhes bya ba bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga bram ze dbang pos 
[\[133b.2\]]byin zhes bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur to/_/maud gal gyi bu chen po de lta bas na/_gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas dge ba mngon par 'dus byas te/_bag yod pas gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes 
[\[133b.3\]]par yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba la kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du mdzad do/_/de las kyi rnam par smin pa des zhabs shin tu brtan par 
[\[133b.4\]]gnas te/_sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mnga' bar gyur/_phyag bzang zhing dpe byad mnga' bar gyur cing gnas ma yin pa shes pa'ang brnyes so/_/lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba de la skye bo mang po yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes 
[\[133b.5\]]pa kun 'byung ba shes pa brnyes so//_//bam po bcu gsum pa/_ngas lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yang dag par blang ba de'i bsngags pa brjod de/_de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa brnyes so/_/lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab 
[\[133b.6\]]pa yang dag par blang ba de la ngas skye bo'i tshogs mang po rab tu bkod de/_las kyi rnam par smin pa des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/_/ngas phyir mi 'phrogs pa yang thugs su chud de/_maud gal gyi bu nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 
[\[133b.7\]]dam bcas pa las nam yang 'gal bar ma byas te/_ngas ji ltar dam bcas pa de ltar byas so/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gdugs gcig pa sa rnams kyi dbang phyug sbyin pa po sbyin bdag dam bcas par 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]don yod par byed pa/_dam bcas pa las mi 'da' ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i tshe bram ze tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po dpal gyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal ba zhes brjod de/_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis blangs pa/_sa dbang dpal gyi snying po 
[\[134a.2\]]rgyal bar spyon/_/yon tan ldan pas rgya mtsho sar bcas skyongs/_/bdag gi mchis brang du ni sras mo stsol/_/bdag slong 'bras bu yod par rgyal pos mdzod/_/bram ze de dka' thub spyod pa yin te/_bdag gi lus shin tu skem la skra ser/_so mi sdug cing dkar la gtsigs 
[\[134a.3\]]pa/_shel gyi mig la blta na mi bzad cing /_ral pa'i thor tshugs can de mthong nas/_rgyal po de 'jigs shing skrag la mi dga' ste/_ba spu'i khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur pa nas/_'jigs par sems pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i bar du gyur te/_gal te bu mo 'di ma byin na/_
[\[134a.4\]]de bdag la dmod pa byed par 'gyur/_gzhan yang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bkur sti bya ba yin te/_bdag gis dam bcas pa dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/bu mo de ni yul gyi bzang mo zhes bya ste/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/_rgyal 
[\[134a.5\]]po'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar de ltar bdag gis dam bcas na/_drang srong 'di ni gzugs mi sdug la/_bdag gi bu mo 'di ni 
[\[134a.6\]]mchog tu gzugs bzang ba yin te/_'di ltar de'i bdag por mi dga' bar 'gyur bas dam bcas pa gzhig par bya'o snyam ste/_de sems pa 'di la zhugs nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas bu mo yul gyi bzang mo des/_pha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yab 
[\[134a.7\]]cig dgongs shing shin tu dgongs par mdzad/_/bram ze'i tshig las 'gal bar ma mdzad cig_/'di 'dra'i las kyis bdag bskyed yab yum la'ang /_/dbang mi mnga' bas khyim thab de stsol cig_/de nas rgyal po dpal gyi snying po bu mo de'i tshig thos nas/_mgu zhing 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]dga' la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_bu mo yul gyi bzang mo de bram ze de la byin no/_/de nas bram ze des bu mo de blangs nas song ste/_bu bskyed nas chung ma dang bu bzhag ste/_yang rab tu byung ngo /_/rgyal po des bram ze de'i bsam pa 
[\[134b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar skyes te/_de 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi tshe'i tshad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_mir skyes pa na phyir mi 'phrogs pa'i chos thams cad thob bo/_/maud gal 
[\[134b.3\]]gyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba de gzhan ma yin te/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa thob cing bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi 'phrogs so/_/
[\[134b.4\]]maud gal gyi bu des na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems can dpag tu med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa thob cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rnam par smin pa la the tsom med 
[\[134b.5\]]de/_de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa thugs su chud pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'ang brnyes so/_/ngas gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag mngon par 'dus byas te/_sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la bcug pa des nga 
[\[134b.6\]]rab tu dga' ba gzhal du med pa skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa thob ste/_shes pa gang dang ldan pas bdag dang sems can rnams kyi gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa so sor shes so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[134b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gnas ma yin pa shes pa rgyur bcas dang /_/de bzhin 'gog dang lam dang sems can gyi/_/spyod dang bsam pa nges par de yi mthus/_/ngas ni brtag dang spyod pa kun tu shes/_/maud gal gyi bu de la de bzhin 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gshegs pa yun ring du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rtag par rab tu dran pa nye bar gzhag par gyur te/_dran pa'i dbang po gang gis nga shin tu nye bar gnas pas yun ring por byas pa dang /_yun ring por bshad pa ma brjod de/_maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[135a.2\]]dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma zhes bya ba nas rgya cher sbyar te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma de'i rim gro pa/_dge slong yid du 'ong zhes bya bar gyur te/_
[\[135a.3\]]de lo bye ba phrag drug cur de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma de'i rim gro pa byas shing yid du 'ong ste/_yid du mi 'ong ba ma yin pas bshad pa yang 'dzin la/_rang gi don kyang mi gtong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig po de la sangs rgyas khri nyis stong byung ste/_de dag 
[\[135a.4\]]thams cad kyi rim gro bar yang dge slong yid 'ong de gyur to/_/de ltar phyis de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi shugs brnyes zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i rim gro par yang dge slong yid 'ong de gyur te/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba des lha dang mi rnams su skyes so/_/maud gal gyi bu de'i tshe de'i 
[\[135a.5\]]dus na dge slong yid 'ong zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na de ltar mi blta ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong yid 'ong zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga 'das pa shes pa thob cing /_dran pa shes pa de ngas skye bo mang po yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing /_gzhan 
[\[135a.6\]]dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang yid dga' bas rjes su yi rangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga 'das pa'i shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa brnyes so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang shes pa de yang shes pa gang gis yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_'das pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon sum du 
[\[135a.7\]]byas/_thabs gang gis nga spyad pa spyod pa na/_de skye bo'i tshogs mang po shes pa de la rab tu bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga 'das pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/_/maud gal gyi bu nga ma 'ongs pa shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pa na/_dka' ba mang po byas te/_gtang bar dka' ba btang nas ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bdag sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bar gyur cig snyam mo/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes 
[\[135b.2\]]bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gsal ba'i sgron ma de'i 'khor nyan thos 'bum byung ngo /_/de ma 'ongs pa'i dus las brtsams nas nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa de'i tshe/_dge slong rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa zhes bya ba de'i 'khor nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de 
[\[135b.3\]]'di snyam du sems te/_kye e ma bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan par gyur cig snyam nas/_de de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gsal ba'i sgron ma de la gser gyi me tog chen po mngon par gtor te smon lam btab pa/_kye e ma bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'di lta bu'i 
[\[135b.4\]]ye shes skye bar gyur cig ces btab ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa brnyes so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des kyang nga rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mkhyen te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa brnyes so/_/rgyu dang rkyen gang zhig yod na ma 'ongs pa shes pa kun 
[\[135b.5\]]'byung ba shes pa yang dag par 'grub kyi/_de'i rgyu med na de lta bu rab tu shes par mi 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon sum du byas so/_/nga mchog tu dga' ba gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bstan te/_shes pa de 
[\[135b.6\]]mngon par dga' zhing yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas nga ma 'ongs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa brnyes so/_/maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang da ltar byung ba'i shes pa bsgrub pa'i don du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dag mngon par 'dus byas te/_maud gal gyi 
[\[135b.7\]]bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas spyan zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar 'jig rten du byung ste/_de 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bltas pa la/_da ltar byung ba'i dus las brtsams te chos ston to/_/de'i tshe bram ze blo ldan zhes bya ba shing sA la chen po lta bu zhig kyang de'i 'khor nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pas da ltar gyi dus las brtsams nas chos ston pa 
[\[136a.2\]]bram ze blo ldan shing sA la chen po lta bus thos so/_/thos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung nas ngo mtshar du bya ba gzhal du med pa zhig skyes par gyur te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas da ltar byung ba'i dus las brtsams nas spobs pa thogs pa med pas chos ston pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/
[\[136a.3\]]'di ni rmad du byung ba'o snyam mo/_/de de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung nas ngo mtshar du bya ba thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la rin po che'i me tog gtor te smon lam btab pa/_kye e ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas spobs 
[\[136a.4\]]pa thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston par gyur cig ces btab ste/_de las kyi rnam par smin pa des bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyad cur log par ltung bar ma song ngo /_/maud gal gyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze blo ldan shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems 
[\[136a.5\]]na khyod kyis de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze blo ldan shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga da ltar byung ba'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes skyes te/_ngas da ltar byung ba'i shes pa de la skye bo'i tshogs mang po btsud do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des 
[\[136a.6\]]nga da ltar byung ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa mngon par grub ste/_da ltar byung ba'i shes pa de yang ngas mngon sum du byas shing yang dag par rab tu bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag gis kyang mngon sum du byas so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa mngon sum du 
[\[136a.7\]]byas te/_lam gang gis da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mngon sum du byas pa de shes par bya ba'i don du sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongs su zhus so/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon byung ba 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas gzigs zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzigs de'i nyan thos 
[\[136b.2\]]kyi dge 'dun ther 'bum phrag bdun byung ngo /_/de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de'i nang du bzhugs nas da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam las brtsams te/_lam 'dis da ltar byung ba'i tshul yongs su shes par bya'o zhes chos ston to/_/de'i tshe rgyal rigs sa ga'i bshes gnyen zhes bya 
[\[136b.3\]]ba shing sA la chen po lta bu de'i 'khor nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur nas/_des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzigs de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byung ba mkhyen pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam las brtsams nas gang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[136b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang /_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dag spyod pa la lam gyi khyad par gyi chos ston pa thos par 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzigs des rgyal rigs sa ga'i bshes gnyen shing sA la 
[\[136b.5\]]chen po lta bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sa ga'i bshes gnyen khyod 'di ltar yun ring por chos zab mo spyad zab mo'i tshul la rab tu gnas shing sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas te/_skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don du bsams nas/_zab mo de dag zhu ba zhus pa de legs so 
[\[136b.6\]]legs so/_/sa ga'i bshes gnyen de'i phyir rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/rgyal rigs sa ga'i bshes gnyen shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces 
[\[136b.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/sa ga'i bshes gnyen sems can dag gzugs la 'dod chags spyod pa'i gnyen po ni mi gtsang ba'o/_/sems can dag sgra la 'dod chags spyod pa'i gnyen po ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes so/_/de bzhin du sems can dag dri la 'dod chags spyod pa'i gnyen po ni stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]sems can dag ro la 'dod chags spyod pa'i gnyen po ni mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes so/_/sems can dag reg bya la 'dod chags spyod pa'i gnyen po ni sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes so/_/sems can dag chos la 'dod chags spyod pa'i gnyen po ni bdag med pa'i 'du shes so/_/
[\[137a.2\]]sa ga'i bshes gnyen tshul 'dis ni sems can dag ji ltar spyod pa'i gnyen po bstan par bya ste/_sa ga'i bshes gnyen gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi lam yod cing lam gyi spyod pa yod de 'di lta ste the tshom med pa'i sman 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes so/_/sa ga'i 
[\[137a.3\]]bshes gnyen gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa the tshom med par lam gang la sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa lam gyi mchog la lam gang gis yang dag par spong ba 'di lta ste/_rnam par thar ba'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'o/_/sa ga'i bshes gnyen 'di lta ste/_mtshan ma thams 
[\[137a.4\]]cad yid la mi byed pa 'di yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa the tsom med pa'i lam 'ching ba thams cad yang dag par gcod par 'gyur ro/_/sa ga'i bshes gnyen ngas shes pa 'di bsgrub pa'i phyir/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dag la bsnyen bkur byas te/_de ltar ngas dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[137a.5\]]bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis ngas da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam bsgrubs so/_/maud gal gyi bu de nas rgyal rigs sa ga'i bshes gnyen shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzigs de la rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gis 
[\[137a.6\]]mngon par gtor/_mngon par rab tu gtor nas lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/maud gal gyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal rigs sa ga'i bshes gnyen shing sA la chen po ltar gyur pa de gzhan yin par sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[137a.7\]]na rgyal rigs sa ga'i bshes gnyen shing sA la chen po lta bur gyur to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa mngon par yang dag par thugs su chud do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/rgyal ba 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]kun gzigs skyob la bkur sti byas pas su/_/dge rtsa de yis da ltar byung shes nga rnam sbyangs/_/de 'dra'i dge rtsa med na kun mthong mi nus te/_/dge rtsa gang gis da ltar byung shes nga rnam sbyangs/_/nga ni chos gang mi shes ci yang med pas na/_/bdud kyi zhags pa'i rgyud las sems can 
[\[137b.2\]]thar bar bya/_/maud gal gyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dri ba'i rang bzhin can du bya ste/_maud gal gyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/maud gal gyi bu sngon 
[\[137b.3\]]byung ba 'das pa'i dus 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa khrid mdzad ces bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'di zheng du dpag tshad drug khrir gyur cing /_kun nas gru bzhi la ji tsam 
[\[137b.4\]]du srid du yod pa de tsam du zheng du yang gru bzhi ste/_'di lta ste mdzes par sprul pa shin tu rnam par phye ba mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bris pa/_gser gyi gdugs kyis shin tu bkab pa/_lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur to/_/de'i tshe nga 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal por gyur te/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rgyal 
[\[137b.5\]]ba'i sde zhes bya'o/_/de'i bu stong tshang bar byung ste/_de'i bu thu bo gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad la 'dris par byas pa stong pa nyid la mos pa/_chos zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa rgya chen po la mos shing /_
[\[137b.6\]]chos dman pa la ma mos te/_chos dman pa la rnam par smod pa/_blo gros shin tu zhib pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i sde 'di snyam du gyur te/_gzhon nu 'di ni shin tu blo zab cing chos dang ldan pa yin te/_bdag gis de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam nas/_des de la 
[\[137b.7\]]smras pa/_gzhon nu khyod kyi bya ba ci yod/_des smras pa/_yab gal te bdag la thugs dpag mdzad na/_dge sbyong dang bram ze mang du thos pa las bsdur gsol/_yab bdag chos rnams la the tsom mchis te/_de bdag gis dri bar bgyi na/_'di ltar chos kyi the tshom gcod pa rdo thogs 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]pa de 'tshal to/_/de nas rgyal po rgyal ba'i sde de gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros kyi tshig thos nas/_gang 'jig rten gyi khams na/_dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa blo gros 'thun pa/_spyod pa ma nyams pa de dag rgyal po rgyal ba'i sde de'i skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su bsdus so/_/de nas 
[\[138a.2\]]gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros dge sbyong dang /_bram ze mkhas pa de dag dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi gnas ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa dpyod pa de dag dang lhan cig tu chos bgro bar byed do/_/'phags pa dag 'jig rten na ci gnod 
[\[138a.3\]]de la kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/dbul ba ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_dbul bas nyen pa'i sems can dag ni ci nas kyang bdag de la brten te bde bar bya'o snyam nas gzhan la rten par byed do/_/kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/brnyas pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de brnyas par bya ba'i sems 
[\[138a.4\]]can dag ni ci nas kyang de la brten te brnyas su mi 'dod do snyam nas gzhan la rten par byed do/_/kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/ngag dang mi ldan pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_ngag nyams pa'i sems can dag ni ci nas kyang de la brten te bde bar bya'o snyam nas gzhan la rten par byed do/_/
[\[138a.5\]]kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/blo dang mi ldan pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_blo rnam par nyams pa'i sems can dag ni ci nas kyang bdag de la brten te blo thob par byas la/_blo'i stobs bskyed pa gang gis bde bar 'tsho bar bya'o snyam nas gzhan la rten par byed do/_/kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/
[\[138a.6\]]don yongs su nyams pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_don yongs su nyams pa'i sems can dag ni ci nas kyang de la brten te/_don yongs su nyams pa med par bya'o snyam nas gzhan la rten par byed do/_/kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/mdza' bshes dang bral ba ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_mdza' 
[\[138a.7\]]bshes dang bral ba'i sems can dag ni ci nas kyang de la brten te/_bde bar 'tsho bar bya'o snyam nas gzhan la rten par byed do/_/kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/bzo mi shes pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_bzo mi shes pa'i skyes bu dag ni ci nas kyang de la brten te/_bde bar 'tsho bar bya'o snyam nas 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]gzhan la rten par byed do/_/kha cig gis 'di skad smras so/_/rgyal srid nyams pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_rgyal srid nyams na rgyal po la brten pa thams cad sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag gis 'di skad smras so/_/rgyal po la brnyas na sdug bsngal zhing /_rgyal po'i blon po la brnyas na yang 
[\[138b.2\]]sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag gis 'di skad smras so/_/chung ma ma gus pa dag ni gnod de/_khyim thab 'khrugs na gsod par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag gis 'di skad smras so/_/gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro ba ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro 
[\[138b.3\]]ba'i sems can dag ni rgyu des nyon mongs par 'gyur te/_de lta bas na gzhan gyi bud med kyi gan du 'gro ba ni 'jig rten na gnod do/_/gzhan dag gis 'di skad smras so/_/chog mi shes pa ni 'jig rten na gnod de/_chog mi shes pa'i skyes bu ni lcags kyi lam dang /_phur bu'i 
[\[138b.4\]]lam dang /_spa'i lam nas 'gro zhing chog mi shes pa'i skyes bu chags pas zil gyis non pa'i sems kun nas 'dzin pas nor gyi phyir gzhan gyi khyim du 'jug ste/_de ni de las nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag gis 'di skad smras so/_/byas pa mi gzo ba ni 'jig rten na 
[\[138b.5\]]gnod de/_byas pa mi gzo ba'i skyes bu ni phan pa byed pa la mi lta ste/_de sngon phan pa byas pa la mi rtog cing /_sngon gyi phan pa byed pa la mi lta/_de sngon phan pa byas pa'i sngon gyi don la mi rtog cing /_sngon gyi phan pa rnam par 'jig par byed la/_byas pa mi gzo ba phal cher gnod par 
[\[138b.6\]]bya ba sems te/_'di skad ces thos so/_/skyes bu gang zhig tshal gyi nang du song ba las sprin nag po byung nas mgon med skyabs med pa las dom zhig gis bskyabs te/_de des khrid nas rang gi gnas su bcug go/_/de der zhag bdun du 'bras bu dang rtsa bas gsos te/_'di grang bas 
[\[138b.7\]]sdug bsngal skyes pa med par bya'o zhes zer nas bzung ste mchan du bcug go_/de nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang sprin nag po de med de de'i gnas nas phyung ste gtong ngo /_/de nas sngon gyi phan btags pa yongs su gtang ste/_rngon pa gzhan dag gis mthong bar byas nas dom de bsad do/_/
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]de lta bas na byas pa mi gzo ba nyid ni 'jig rten na sdug bsngal te/_'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po sna tshogs rab tu bstan to/_/de nas gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros kyis dge sbyong dang bram ze mkhas pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag gis 
[\[139a.2\]]sdug bsngal dang gnod pa sna tshogs bshad pa ni bdag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gzhan yang bdag gis 'jig rten na gnod pa gsum mthong ste/_gnod pa gang gis sems can dag gnod cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gsum gang zhe na/_rga bas gnod pa dang /_na bas gnod pa dang /_'chi bas 
[\[139a.3\]]gnod pa ste/_gsum po 'di dag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa gnod pas gnod de/_de las nges par 'byung ba yang dag par rab tu mi shes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bar snang la khrid mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de skye ba dang 
[\[139a.4\]]rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba las yang dag par 'da' ba'i chos ston to zhes de skad thos te/_khyed cag tshur shog_/lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du dong la 'jig rten na gnod pa du mchis zhes zhu bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ji lta ba bzhin du lung ston te/_de ltar 
[\[139a.5\]]don gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros srog chags bye ba phrag drug dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa khrid mdzad de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/srog chags 
[\[139a.6\]]bye ba phrag drug po de dag kyang so sor skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/rgyal po gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros phyogs gcig tu 'dug pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_shin tu dri med thugs zhi lhar bcas pa'i/_/'jig rten khrid mdzad 
[\[139a.7\]]khyod la zhu ba ni/_/'gro ba spyod pa'i gnod pa gang lags pa/_/kun tu spyan mnga' de dag bdag la gsungs/_/chags pa gang gis 'gro ba'i gnod pa dag_/phan mdzad brtse ldan de dag bdag la gsungs/_/gang zhig thos nas skye bo'am gal te bdag_/rab tu thar bar bgyi ba 'tshal 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]bar bgyi/_/gzhon nu'i tshig des shin tu yon tan ldan/_/zhu ba 'di ni khrid mdzad gsan nas kyang /_/rgyal ba chos rnams thams cad thugs chud pa'i/_/'dren pas 'jig rten phan phyir lung bstan pa/_/gang gis skye la gnod pa'i rnam pa ni/_/rga dang na dang 'chi dang mya ngan dang /_/rnam 
[\[139b.2\]]pa sna tshogs sdug bsngal gnod 'gyur ba/_/'gro ba nye bar nyon mongs mi shes so/_/skyes ma thag tu sngon gyi las kyis su/_/ngan pa'am bzang po'i rjes su myur du 'gro/_/de bzhin dma' ba'am mtho ba'i rigs su skye/_/khyad par de yis kha dog phun sum tshogs/_/gzugs ngan pa'am 
[\[139b.3\]]mngon par gzugs bzang dang /_/bud med skyes pa de bzhin ma ning ngam/_/tshangs pa de bzhin rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs/_/dbul ba'am de bzhin longs spyod ldan pa'am/_/dbang po nyams pa med pa 'thob pa'am/_/de bzhin dbang po dag ni ma tshang ba/_/skye ba srid pa de yis 
[\[139b.4\]]gnod pa yin/_/rga dang na dang 'chi ba sdig yin te/_/khro ba spangs pas gzugs bzang 'thob 'gyur la/_/khro ba bskyed pas gzugs ngan 'thob par 'gyur/_/nga rgyal bskyed pas brnyas pa 'thob 'gyur la/_/nga rgyal spangs pas bkur sti 'thob par 'gyur/_/srog chags 
[\[139b.5\]]bsad pas tshe ni thung 'gyur la/_/bsrung ba byas pas tshe ring tshe 'phel 'gyur/_/srog chags gtses pas ngan 'gror de 'gro la/_/mi yi skye bar de ni nad can 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten sems can bsrung byas shing /_/sdug bsngal mang po 'jigs las 
[\[139b.6\]]dbugs phyung ba/_/las de byas pas mi ni spangs nas su/_/lha gnas dag tu de ni rab tu dga'/_/lha las shi nas rjes su mi thob ste/_/bde zhing nad med dran pa mngon du 'byung /_/skye bar nam yang sdug bsngal mi myong ste/_/lha dang mi yi yid du 'ong bar 
[\[139b.7\]]'gyur/_/mi gang gzhan gyi bud med der 'gro na/_/mi las shi nas ngan 'gror de 'gro la/_/lcags kyi shal mar tsher ma rnon po yis/_/'bigs par byed cing sdug bsngal mi yis gdungs/_/sdig can dmyal ba'i las ni zad byas nas/_/mi yis 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'jig rten rnyed dka' thob nas su/_/rang gis chung ma la yang dbang med cing /_/las mi shes pas de ni mya ngan byed/_/gang dag gzhan gyi bud med sdom byed cing /_/gzhan gyi bud med dag la yid mi gtod/_/mi yi lus ni de yis 
[\[140a.2\]]spangs nas su/_/'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris rab tu dga'/_/de rtag lha yi 'jig rten shes rab ldan/_/mkhas pa mi yi 'jig rten thob nas kyang /_/gus byed bud med rnyed cing rjes 'brang la/_/bsam pa 'thun pa'i slob ma rnyed par 'gyur/_/
[\[140a.3\]]mi gang tshig la shin tu mi sdom pa/_/de la dris na rdzun pa'i tshig smra ste/_/mi las shi nas ngan 'gror de 'gro zhing /_/legs pa ma yin sdug bsngal tshor myong 'gyur/_/de nas shi nas mi yi srid par 'ongs/_/mi yi 'jig rten rnyed dka' thob nas su/_/
[\[140a.4\]]yang dag ma yin med pa'i skur pa 'thob/_/mi yi 'jig rten dag tu nyon mongs 'tsho/_/mi gang tshig ni shin tu sdom pa dag_/bden pa srung la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi smra ba/_/mi yi 'jig rten shi nas brtul zhugs gtsang /_/yon tan ldan pa lha yi 'jig rten 
[\[140a.5\]]'gro/_/mkhas pa gtsang ba'i las dag zad nas su/_/lha las shi nas mi yi 'jig rten 'ong /_/de yis smras pa yang dag tshad mar 'gyur/_/gtsang ma'i 'bras bu de ni mi 'thun med/_/mi yi 'jig rten du ni phra ma dang /_/mi yi srid par dbyen sbyor 
[\[140a.6\]]byed pa ni/_/mi yi lus 'di dag ni spangs nas su/_/de ni ngan song sdug bsngal 'thob cing myong /_/de nas shi nas mi srid 'dir 'ongs te/_/mi yi 'jig rten rnyed dka' 'thob nas kyang /_/ji ltar rtswa rtser zil pa mi gnas ltar/_/mdza' bshes dang ni de bzhin 
[\[140a.7\]]gnyen 'byed do/_/mi 'thun pa yi mi dag bsdums byas na/_/'di nas shi nas mtho ris rab tu dga'/_/de ni lha yul dag na shin tu bkur/_/lha yi tshogs kyis mkhas pa yang dag mchod/_/de nas shi nas mi srid 'dir 'ongs te/_/bsam pa 'thun pa'i bud 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]med phun sum tshogs/_/snying nye mi phyed 'khor ni rnyed 'gyur te/_/nyes pa'i gnas na 'dug kyang de mi gtong /_/'jam po ma yin tshig rtsub smra ba ni/_/gzhan la mya ngan byed 'jug mi sdom pa/_/mi yi lus 'di dag ni spangs nas su/_/ngan song thob cing sdug 
[\[140b.2\]]bsngal tshor ba reg_/ngan song tshor ba sdug bsngal zad byas shing /_/de nas shi ste mi yi srid par 'ong /_/gang gis rtag tu sems khro mi 'dod tshig_/thos shing de yi yid ni rab tu 'khrug_/snyan par smra ba'i tshig dang ldan pa ni/_/pha rol sems la shin tu dga' bar 
[\[140b.3\]]byed/_/de ni mi yi lus dag spangs nas kyang /_/'di nas shi nas bde 'gro rab tu dga'/_/gtsang ldan de ni mtho ris shi nas su/_/mi yi 'jig rten du ni lus thob nas/_/gang gis yang dang yang du yid 'ong sgra/_/thos nas rtag tu 'di'i sems shin tu dga'/_/
[\[140b.4\]]gang zhig don byed dus ma yin par smra/_/de yi tshig ni mngon par mi 'dod de/_/mi yi lus ni de yis spangs nas su/_/ngan song rnyed cing sdug bsngal des myong 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las kyi rnam smin zad byas nas/_/de nas shi nas mi srid 'dir 'ongs te/_/de'i tshig 
[\[140b.5\]]mngon par 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing /_/mkhas par mi 'gyur nams kyang mchod mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig don chen tshig dang don ldan pa/_/dus su smra byed skye bo rab tu dga'/_/de yis mi yi lus dag spangs nas su/_/lha yi 'jig rten bde bar de rab dga'/_/de nas
