[\[297a.3\]]len pa med pa nyid gang zhe na/_'jam dpal zag pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ni zag pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/_bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /_srid pa'i zag pa dang /_ma rig pa'i zag pa dang /_lta ba'i zag pa ste/_zag pa bzhi po de dang bral ba'o/_/len pa 
[\[297a.4\]]med pa nyid ces bya ba ni len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/_bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste 'dod pa'i len pa dang /_lta ba'i len pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba'i len pa ste/_len pa bzhi po de dag dang bral ba'o/_/
[\[297a.5\]]'jam dpal de la sems can ma rig pas ldongs par byas pa/_sred pas dkrugs par gyur pa dag ni phan tshun mngon par zhen par gyur nas len par byed kyi de bzhin gshegs pas ni bdag tu smra ba'i len pa rtsa ba yin par yongs su shes nas/_bdag rnam par dag pas sems can 
[\[297a.6\]]thams cad rnam par dag pa rjes su rtogs par gyur te/_bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med la/_gnyis su med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa yin 
[\[297a.7\]]no/_/'jam dpal skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa la ni sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_'jam dpal gang la sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa mi 'jug pa de la ni yongs su rtogs pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med do/_/tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa de ni ma rig pa kun nas slong ba mi byed do/_/ma rig pa kun nas ldang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gi kun nas slong ba med pa yin no/_/srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis 
[\[297b.2\]]po dag gi kun nas ldang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa yin no/_/skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni skyon med pa yin no/_/skyon med pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i don yin no/_/nges pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don dam pa yin no/_/don dam pa gang yin pa de ni gang zag med pa'i don yin no/_/
[\[297b.3\]]gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa'i don yin no/_/brjod du med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don yin no/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don gang yin pa de ni chos kyi don yin no/_/chos kyi don gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i don yin te/_de'i 
[\[297b.4\]]phyir gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo /_/gang gis chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes gsungs te/_ji ltar yongs su tshol ba na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste sems dang dmigs pa 
[\[297b.5\]]ste/_des gang gi tshe sems dang dmigs pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe na yang dag par mthong ba yin pas/_de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos de dag de ltar mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal byang chub ni dag pa dang /_dri ma med pa dang 
[\[297b.6\]]nyon mongs pa med pa yin te/_'jam dpal de la dag pa ni gang dri ma med pa ni gang nyon mongs pa med pa ni gang zhe na/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o/_/mngon par 'du 
[\[297b.7\]]bya ba med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/'byung ba med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/rang bzhin ni dag pa'o/_/yongs su dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o/_/spros pa dang bral ba ni dri ma med pa'o/_/spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]mongs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma med pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/nam mkha' ni dag pa'o/_/bar snang ni dri ma med pa'o/_/nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/nang yongs 
[\[298a.2\]]su shes pa ni dag pa'o/_/phyi rol tu rgyu ba med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/phyi nang dmigs su med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/_/khams rang bzhin med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/skye mched rnams spong ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/'das pa la 
[\[298a.3\]]zad par shes pa ni dag pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa la mi skye bar shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o/_/da ltar byung ba la chos gnas par shes pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar dag pa dang dri ma med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa ni gnas gcig tu yang dag par 'du ste/_'di lta ste/_zhi ba'i 
[\[298a.4\]]gnas su'o/_/zhi ba gang yin pa de ni rab tu zhi ba yin no/_/rab tu zhi ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba yin no/_/nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi bar gyur pa yin no/_/nye bar zhi bar gyur gang yin pa de ni thub pa zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar na nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de 
[\[298a.5\]]bzhin no/_/byang chub ji lta bar chos rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/chos rnams ji lta bar sems can rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/sems can rnams ji lta bar zhing rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/zhing rnams ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal de'i phyir chos thams cad ni mya ngan 
[\[298a.6\]]las 'das pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/_mthar thug par gyur pa'i phyir gnyen po med pa yin la/_gnyen po med pa'i phyir gzod ma nas dag pa dang /_gzod ma nas dri ma med pa dang /_gzod ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad de ltar mngon par 
[\[298a.7\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa sems can rnams kyi khams la rnam par gzigs pa ni sems can rnams la dag pa dri ma med pa nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol ba zhes bya ba'i thugs rje chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]zhe na/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zad pa'i phyir rlom sems su mi byed cing ma zad pa'i phyir yang ma yin/_skye ba'i phyir yang ma yin/_mi skye ba'i phyir yang ma yin/_gtan zad pa zad par bya ba'i phyir yang ma yin/_gtan mi skye ba rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi byed pa de ltar spyod 
[\[298b.2\]]na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa'i sems la zad pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_ma 'ongs pa'i sems la ma thob pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/_da ltar byung ba'i sems la yod ces bya bar mi spyod 
[\[298b.3\]]cing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems la chags par mi 'gyur ba de ltar spyod na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dang /_byang chub dang /_sems can rnams dang /_de bzhin 
[\[298b.4\]]gshegs pa de la gnyis su med de/_gnyis su byar med pa de ltar spyod na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang /_byang chub dang /_sems can rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa de ltar spyod na 
[\[298b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa dang /_byang chub dang /_sems can rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang byang chub dang /_sems can rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[298b.6\]]byang chub dang /_sems can rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin du shes rab dang /_byang chub dang /_sems can rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med pa de ltar spyod na/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub 
[\[298b.7\]]sems dpa' gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/_mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de ltar spyod na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gal 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]te byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de ltar spyod na/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal sems 
[\[299a.2\]]dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir gang yongs su shes pa'am/_spang ba'am/_bsgom pa'am/_mngon sum du bya ba'i chos de dag gang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal zad pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gtan zad pa kho na yin no/_/gtan zad pa gang yin 
[\[299a.3\]]pa de ni zad par bya ba ma yin no/_/zad par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir mi zad pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de ni ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa yin la/_ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa gang yin pa de la ni zad pa cung zad kyang med la/_gang la zad pa cung zad kyang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/_'dus 
[\[299a.4\]]ma byas pa gang yin pa de la ni skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung /_chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa kho na zhes bya ste/_ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa de bzhin 
[\[299a.5\]]du shes pa de yang 'jug par mi byed ldog par mi byed do/_/ji ltar shes pa de 'jug par mi byed/_ldog par mi byed pa de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pas zag pa skyed par mi byed/_'gag par mi byed do/_/'jam dpal zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad dang /_sgra dang /_yi ge dang /_
[\[299a.6\]]brdar gdags pa yin te/_'di la ni skye ba'am/_'gag par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang med do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[299a.7\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/kha dog rtags dang dbyibs mi mnga'/_/rtsa ba mi mnga' gnas mi mnga'/_/mi 'gag 'byung ba mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]lo/_/mi gnas gnas pa mi mnga' ba/_/blang ba mi mnga' dor mi mnga'/_/skye mched drug las rnam grol ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing /_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/_/'du byed mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 
[\[299b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/khams gsum dag las rnam par grol/_/mkha' ltar mnyam nyid thugs su chud/_/'dod pa rnams kyis mi gos pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gshegs dang bzhugs dang gzims pa yi/_/spyod lam rnam pa thams cad du/_/rtag tu mnyam par 
[\[299b.3\]]bzhag mdzad pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnyam par byon cing mnyam par gshegs/_/mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa po/_/mnyam zhing 'khrugs par mi mdzad pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mnyam pa nyid la zhugs gyur cing /_/chos rnams kun la mnyam par 
[\[299b.4\]]bzhag_/mtshan ma med la zhugs gyur pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi gnas dmigs pa mi mnga' ba/_/shes rab bsags shing mnyam par bzhag_/chos la mnga' dbang brnyes gyur pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can kun gyi sgra skad dang /_/de 
[\[299b.5\]]bzhin gzugs dang spyod lam dag_/skad cig gcig gis gzigs mdzad pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ming dang gzugs las rnam par grol/_/rgyu dang phung po thams cad bcad/_/rnam pa med la 'jug mdzad pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtshan ma dag 
[\[299b.6\]]dang rnam bral zhing /_/mtshan ma'i rnam pa rnam par spangs/_/mtshan ma med la 'jug mdzad pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag rtog pa rnam ma brtags/_/thugs yid rab tu mi gnas shing /_/yid mdzad mi mnga' mi dgongs pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[299b.7\]]lo/_/nam mkha' 'dra bar gnas mi mnga'/_/thogs pa mi mnga' spros mi mnga'/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha' dbus mtha' ma mchis pa/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid de dang 'dra/_/dus gsum yang dag 'das gyur 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te/_/nam mkha'ang mtshan nyid mchis ma lags/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam grol ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngar 'dzin mi mnga' sgra mi mnga'/_/gzung ba ma mchis chu zla 
[\[300a.2\]]'dra/_/chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phung po rnams dang skye mched dang /_/khams rnams dag la mi gnas la/_/phyin ci log las rnam par grol/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' gnyis dag las rnam grol zhing /_/bdag tu lta ba 
[\[300a.3\]]yang dag bcad/_/chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzugs kyi grangs las rnam grol zhing /_/dam chos ma lags rnam par spangs/_/len dang gtong ba mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud kyi ming las rab 'das shing /_/
[\[300a.4\]]chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/_/sgrib pa mi mnga' chos gyur pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/don 'tshal rnams kyis mchis mi brjod/_/ma mchis shes kyang brjod mi bgyi/_/lan med tshig lam ma mchis pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnyis kyi chos la mi 
[\[300a.5\]]rten par/_/theg pa'i rgyal mtshan kun tu btsugs/_/gnyis dang gnyis med rnam grol ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis yid kyi nyes pa dang /_/lus kyi nad bzhi pham par mdzad/_/bsam yas dpe dang rnam bral ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lhun gyis grub 
[\[300a.6\]]par 'jug mdzad cing /_/nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/spyod pa mkhyen pas thog drangs pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod dgongs zhi zhing zag mi mnga'/_/'byung min 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can/_/gnas dang rtog pa mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[300a.7\]]dmigs pa mi mnga' thugs kyis su/_/kun gyi sems ni rab tu mkhyen/_/bdag gzhan 'du shes mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dmigs dang dmigs pa rnams kyis ni/_/kun gyi sems ni rmongs par bgyid/_/sgrib pa med pa'i chos gyur pa/_/mi rten khyod la 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/dmigs pa dag dang sems rnams ni/_/ngo bo nyid kyi mchis ma lags/_/bsam yas mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnas pa mi mnga' mkhyen pa yis/_/zhing rnams kun dang de bzhin du/_/sems can kun gyi spyod gzigs pa/_/
[\[300b.2\]]mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis lan 'ga' yang /_/sems dang chos kun gtan ma dmigs/_/chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste/_/sgyu ma nyid kyang mchis ma lags/_/sgyu ma'i chos 
[\[300b.3\]]las rnam grol ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdzogs sangs 'jig rten spyod mdzad kyang /_/'jig rten chos la rten mi mdzad/_/'jig rten rnam rtog mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stong phyir stong la spyod mdzad cing /_/khyod nyid stong zhing spyod 
[\[300b.4\]]yul stong /_/stong pa stong par ston mdzad pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang /_/sgyu 'phrul chen pos rnam 'phrul zhing /_/tha dad ma mchis snyoms zhugs pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/du ma ma lags gcig ma lags/_/
[\[300b.5\]]ring dang nye la mi 'jug cing /_/gdeg dang gzhag pa mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/_/skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas/_/dngos ma mchis par mnyam gzhag pa/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dren pa dus rnams thams 
[\[300b.6\]]cad du/_/mi g.yo mya ngan 'das pa rtogs/_/sna tshogs thabs dang ldan pa po/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnams kyi brgyud pa'i thabs/_/mkhyen pas mkhas par gyur pa lags/_/de phyir mi g.yo mya ngan 'das/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[300b.7\]]mtshan ma mi mnga' lhun gyis grub/_/spros pa mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'/_/snang med bdag gi mi mnga' ba/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam rtog mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'/_/bdag gis bdag nyid ji bzhin par/_/kun tu mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/_/mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]stobs bcu chu bo rgal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jigs bral 'jigs med stsol ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma 'dres chos rnams nges par thugs su chud gyur pa/_/'gro ba kun gyi 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun sbyor 'ching ba bcad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[301a.2\]]pha rol byon te thang la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skye bo ngal ba'i rnam 'dren khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor bar gshegs shing mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba thams cad dag na sems can rnams dang ni/_/thabs cig bzhugs kyang thugs yid rab tu dben gyur pa/_/
[\[301a.3\]]ji ltar pad ma chab kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing /_/sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid shin tu bsten/_/mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rnam par bshig_/khyod la gar yang smon par mdzad pa mchis ma lags/_/ston pa'i go 'phang bla med dben pa nyid lags te/_/dmigs med 
[\[301a.4\]]chu bo rgal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen bsam gyis khyab pa ma lags te/_/mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal 'phags lhun po 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[301a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis legs par smras so/_/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnams ni gzugs las blta bar mi bya ste/_chos las ma yin/_mtshan 
[\[301a.6\]]ma las ma yin/_chos kyi dbyings las kyang ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nyag gcig bzhugs pa ma yin/_skye bo mang po'i nang na bzhugs pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni sus kyang mthong ba ma yin/_thos pa ma yin/_mchod pa ma yin te/_mchod par byed pa yang ma yin no/_/sangs 
[\[301a.7\]]rgyas rnams ni chos 'ga' yang gcig pa nyid dam/_mang po nyid du mi mdzad pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub brnyes pa med do/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni chos gang gis kyang rab tu 'byed par mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos 'ga' yang ma gzigs/_/ma gsan ma dgongs/_rnam 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]par mi mkhyen/_kun tu mi mkhyen to/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma gsungs/_ma brjod do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni mi gsung mi brjod do/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni gsung bar mi 'gyur brjod par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi mdzad 
[\[301b.2\]]do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ma rgyas so/_/sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs pa ma spangs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rnam par byang ba mngon sum du ma mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni chos gang yang ma gzigs/_ma gsan/_
[\[301b.3\]]ma myangs/_ma mnams/_ma reg_/mi mkhyen to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[301b.4\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rang rgyal ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par gyur na/_/de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par gyur na/_gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[301b.5\]]yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal 
[\[301b.6\]]nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes can dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_rkang pa med pa dang /_rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 
[\[301b.7\]]snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_mi'i lus thob nas kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur la/_byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/_nyan thos dang bcas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la/_bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing /_bde ba'i yo byad 
[\[302a.2\]]thams cad kyang nye bar sgrub par byed la/_de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rin po che las byas pa'i 'phang du dpag tshad brgya yod pa/_rin po che'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/_gdugs dang rgyal 
[\[302a.3\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan sgreng ba/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas g.yogs pa sha stag kyang byed du bcug pa bas ni/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan 
[\[302a.4\]]zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed/_'jug par byed/_yid ches par byed cing /_yongs su rtogs par byas nas kyang tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig lung 'bogs par byed na de ni de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'gyur 
[\[302a.5\]]ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par 'gyur te/_bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi 
[\[302a.6\]]cha dang /_grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed cig la bskal pa 
[\[302a.7\]]gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du/_/na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gang gis 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur na/_bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_
[\[302b.2\]]grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub 
[\[302b.3\]]sems dpa' dang bcas/_nyan thos dang bcas pa gang gI'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed dag la bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed par gyur 
[\[302b.4\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung ba bsam pa dag pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa gzhan gang zhig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed/_
[\[302b.5\]]'jug par byed/_yid ches par byed/_yi ger 'dri bar byed/_yi ger 'drir 'jug par byed na bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_
[\[302b.6\]]'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_
[\[302b.7\]]sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar 'bul zhing /_de ltar phul bas bskal pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du 'bul bar phul ba bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]gcig tsam zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la bstan par gyur na/_bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_
[\[303a.2\]]bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal bskal pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du sbyin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba lta zhog gi_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs 
[\[303a.3\]]med pa snyed cig byung bar gyur la/_de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/_shing ljon pa thams cad kyang lha'i gos rnams kyis yongs su dkris pa nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad yang dag par 'dus pa'i dra bas kun nas 
[\[303a.4\]]g.yogs pa/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa/_nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i lan kan gyis yongs su bskor ba dag gis yongs su gang bar byas pa gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa ji snyed 
[\[303a.5\]]cig sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du dbul bar 'bul zhing /_de ltar phul bas bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma ltar grangs med pa snyed du 'bul bar phul ba bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par byas na/_
[\[303a.6\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la bstan tam/_'jug par byas na bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char 
[\[303a.7\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par 'gyur la/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton te/_rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems 
[\[303b.2\]]dpa' rab tu byung ba gzhan gang zhig gis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang ba dang /_ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung 
[\[303b.3\]]ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed cig byung bar gyur la/_de dag las byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang phyogs bcu'i phyogs cha re rer sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong bar 
[\[303b.4\]]gyur cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/_nyan thos dang bcas pa re re la yang bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi 
[\[303b.5\]]gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis kyang bsnyen bkur byed la/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su 
[\[303b.6\]]bkang ste/_dbul bar phul ba las ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par gyur pa gzhan zhig gis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la sbyin pa kham gcig tsam zhig byin par gyur nas/_bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba de la byang chub sems 
[\[303b.7\]]dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma des ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_chos kyi 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi phyag rgya yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan 
[\[304a.2\]]gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig don gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad don gyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la 
[\[304a.3\]]bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[304a.4\]]thams cad chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la 
[\[304a.5\]]zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur pa de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[304a.6\]]'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod par gyur na/_de ni de bas 
[\[304a.7\]]ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig dgra bcom pa 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig 
[\[304b.2\]]cig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan 
[\[304b.3\]]gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig byang chub kyi sems la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas ni byang 
[\[304b.4\]]chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis sems can gcig cig phyir mi ldog pa nyid la bkod par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 
[\[304b.5\]]ldog pa nyid la bkod pa bas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing yi ger 'drir bcug nas gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_tha na sems can gcig cig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug par byas na de ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs 
[\[304b.6\]]med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig zad pa'i dus mtha'i tshe/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu'i dam chos 'dzin pa bas/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan par byed gyur na/_/de ni de bas bsod 
[\[304b.7\]]nams chen po khyad par 'phags/_/gang zhig rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis phyogs bcur song nas ni/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu dag la mchod byed cing /_/snying rje bskyed de bde ba kun la chags med par/_/skyes bu dam pa thams cad phyag 'tshal btsud pa bas/_/gang zhig bder gshegs bstan la sems 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]rab dad gyur cing /_/rgyal ba'i chos rnams smon par byed pa'i mdo sde 'di/_/gzhan la yud tsam gcig cig ston par byed gyur na/_/de ni de bas bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/_/bde gshegs bstan pa'i mdo sde sgron mar gyur pa 'di/_/gang gis lha dang mi la yang dag bstan byas pa/_/de ni shes 
[\[305a.2\]]rab rno zhing mthu chen ldan gyur la/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang myur du 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang gis bde gshegs sangs rgyas mi mchog de dag ni/_/phung po lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las/_/'das par gyur pa dag gi de 'dra'i sgra thos nas/_/sems can gzhan la'ang yang dag sgrogs par byed gyur 
[\[305a.3\]]cing /_/mchod rten gnam 'phang mtho ba srid rtse'i mthar thug pa/_/khyon dang ldan par gyur pa'ang srid rtse ji bzhin pa/_/rin chen mdzes pas spras shing gdugs dang ba dan dang /_/de bzhin dril sgras mdzes par byed du bcug gyur pas/_/'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i/_/mdo sde 'di thos 
[\[305a.4\]]lus la gnas par 'gyur ba'am/_/glegs bam bri ba byas te gzhag par byed 'dod na/_/de ni de yi bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags/_/ser sna'i dri ma bsal bar gyur cing 'jigs med pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos 'di 'dzin byed na/_/de yi bsod nams dpag tu yod par mi 'gyur te/_/ji 
[\[305a.5\]]ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/mdo 'di bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis rab bsngags shing /_/byang chub sems dpa' mang pos yongs su bzung ba yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku lus nam mkha' yi/_/khams dang 'dra ba thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin/_/bcom ldan 'das gyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[305a.6\]]stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa dag dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[305a.7\]]pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
